name: LavaRunner (Incognit0ErgoSum)
description:
Gamepad + Chrome recommended.  If you're playing on a keyboard, here are the controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • S: Jump (A on gamepad)
  • D: Attack (B on gamepad)
  • A: Action (Y on gamepad)

My 3 kids and I built this game over 2022 winter break.  Enjoy. :)
